NotesData.Notes: Next run starts at XX:30. Feel free to grab drink, snack, or take bathroom break in meantime.
Wait for all 4 breachers to come out of ground before attacking.
Press F @ portal entrance. Avoid yellow AOEs.
Throw bombs at Vine Crawler and Overseer Grael to do damage.
Revive Tarocheeki. Kill 4 waves and husk.
Help Burnisher to the pylon. Superspeed burnisher if you have it.
Kill mobs at North and East mirrors. Then, rotate to West and South mirrors.
Escort Vasanni
1-2 help Mansir make to sap gate, then regroup with everyone.
Escort Gorra
Help Mansir open the gate.
Kill 1 corpse taker. Then, destroy sap for credit. Repeat twice.
Finish pylon. Escort Mansir while clearing mobs.
Crash Site. Revive downed NPCs.
Escort Vasanni again
Main group clear mobs ahead. 1-2 stay on Vasanni.
After clearing mobs, stand on meat marker.
Prep CC
CC when wyvern turns around.
All out DPS when Wyvern falls.
Kill 1 corpse taker. Then, destroy sap for credit. Repeat twice.
Deliver Aid to NPCs. Kill mobs for credit.
Prep CC when Teragriff lands after event completes.
Revive Korin. Kill vinetenders and DPS Breacher. Do not CC.
Repeat 3-4 times.
Kill 1 corpse taker. Then, destroy sap for credit. Repeat twice.
Tag Dawkkurra event
Prep CC
CC when wyvern turns around.
All out DPS when Wyvern falls.
Kill 1 corpse taker. Then, destroy sap for credit. Repeat twice.
Kill Monocot
Meta starting soon. Do challenges and tag mustering mobs at all 4 gates for maximum loot.
2-3 taps on vets. Only need 3.5k damage for gold.
2-3 taps on vets. Only need 3.5k damage for gold.
2-3 taps on vets. Only need 3.5k damage for gold.
2-3 taps on vets. Only need 3.5k damage for gold.
Please hold right before the entrance to first sap.
There are 3 sap events. Target 1 Corpse Taker until dead. Then, attack the sap for credit.
Hold at the doorway before entering the Rest!!
Wait for all friends and my call to enter.
Prep CC for when wyvern turns around.
Prep CC
Take the north walkway if you do not have mount
Hold at entrance of cave until whole group is together.
Throw rocks or CC with Turtle mount to remove layers.
You need stealth detection mastery to see the TM. AOE area for credit.
Attack Alpha. Then Beta. One is always invulnerable at given time
Kill rollers when they spawn halfway through.
Split up for mordrem pods and wyvern crystal events!
Group #1 glide up to the islands and deliver the mordrems pods to Briallen
Group #2 climb up to the wyvern nest and deliver the crystals to Chakata.
Thornheart will spawn at my position/marker. Prepare CC.
Elite Stalkers will spawn at my position/marker. Prep CC.
Riders will spawn at my position/marker. Prep CC.
Clear mobs ahead
DPS spitfire. When vintenders spawn, attack them. Then, finish spitfire.
Kill vintenders
Split up for meat and mushroom events!
Group #1 deliver the meat from the nests.
Group #2 defend the mushrooms in the cave. Do not come into the cave if you do not have the poison mastery.
Regroup at camp! Wait for the approaching boss to get closer to camp before attacking.
Elite Stalkers will spawn at my position/marker. Prep CC.
Attack Stavemaster Adryn. CC first. Then DPS.
Thornheart will spawn at my position/marker. Prepare CC.
DPS spitfire. When preservers spawn, attack them. Then, finish spitfire.
Split up for Bramble and Mirrors events!
Group #1 help the NPC. Destroy the bramble. Use the bramble begone to destroy the gates.
Group #2 enter the hole behind the waypoint and help the NPC setup mirrors.
Regroup at camp! Wait for the approaching boss to get closer to camp before attacking.
Attack Stavemaster Adryn. CC first. Then DPS.
The lane boss fight will be coming up soon. I need 5-10 volunteers to drag themselves into subgroup #2.
Elite stalkers will spawn at my position/marker after escort starts.
We will kill the stalkers first, then snipers, and finally the thornheart. Be sure to CC the thornheart.
Clear mobs between us and the gate.
When the gate opens, we will turn right. Group #1 will kill preservers and attack pods. Group #2 will keep boss in center until all pods have been destroyed.
Boss is invulnerable until all pods are destroyed, so be patient.
Group #1 we have to keep doing laps and kill preservers or the pods will respawn. If the pods respawn, the boss respawns.
Group #2 regroup with Group #1 once boss dies. We have to keep doing laps until all other lanes finish.
Zoom out mini-map to see the island events spawning more easily.
If Mordy's head goes left, jump off the island or Mordy will kill you. If Mordy's head goes right, use stability or you will be feared off island.
Split up for engine parts and escort events!
Group #1 deliver engine parts to Kaywinn
Group #2 escort Grumlukl
Group #3 escort Muldotl to swamp and kill mushroom king
Thornheart will spawn at my position/marker. Prepare CC.
Elite Stalkers will spawn at my position/marker. Prep CC.
Riders will spawn at my position/marker. Prep CC.
Clear mobs ahead
DPS spitfire. When vintenders spawn, attack them. Then, finish spitfire.
Kill vintenders

Group #1 deliver scrap to Braeden above.
Group #2 help the soldiers escape in the swamp below
Regroup at camp! Wait for the approaching boss to get closer to camp before attacking.

Attack Blademaster Diarmid. CC first. Then DPS.
Thornheart will spawn at my position/marker. Prepare CC.
DPS spitfire. When preservers spawn, attack them. Then, finish spitfire.

Group #1 climb to the top of mountain, gather supplies, and deliver to NPC at camp
Group #2 escort Alara

Group #1 collect ley-line energy and deliver to collector
Group #2 escort Splort

Group #1 tame the beetles in the cave. Stand on the mushrooms and use warclaw chain to pull them to you.
Group #2 escort Skeln

Attack Axemaster Hareth. CC first. Then DPS.
